about_the_game:
■Story

Recently, I heard rumors about a ghost that has been frequently seen at school.

To find out the truth behind the rumors, he sneaks into the school at night to take pictures of ghosts with his friends.
He tries to take pictures but gets trapped in the school...

■Gameplay

TPS type exploration action adventure game

The player becomes a cameraman who takes pictures of the main character and chases him.
Work with your friends to find the exit through the school building where ghosts roam!
Explore the school building, find items and tools, and solve mysteries.
Will you exterminate ghosts? Or will it bring you to Buddhahood? It's up to you.

■Function

It will be easier to find items if you shine a flashlight on them.

*The flashlight can be charged with dry batteries.

If you do not charge your camera regularly, you will not be able to take pictures.
Switching to night vision mode allows you to see better in the dark, but it also drains the battery faster.
*The camera can be charged from an electrical outlet.

■Operation

・Keyboard＋Mouse
・XBOX Controller
・DualShock4

■Save

Auto-save when changing scenes.
